name: The Central Organisation of Finnish Trade Unions SAK
goal: SAK is a confederation of 21 trade unions in industry, the public sector, transport and private services. Promoting the emotional and material welfare of the members of our affiliated unions is the prime concern of SAK.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Employment, Social Affairs, internal market, industry and research, legal affairs
